alert.note: Alert for Far Northeast Highlands; Harding County; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 15 at 3:06AM MST until January 15 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...North winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Far Northeast Highlands, Harding County and Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs may be blown down. Expect strong cross winds on area roadways.
info.instruction: Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.

area.areaDesc: Far Northeast Highlands; Harding County; Johnson and Bartlett Mesas Including Raton Pass
